group_1.textLeft: Do you know of any other shops that sell@cute chocolates in this area?

group_1.textRight: I'm also at a loss about that.
I was planning on giving someone some@chocolates next week, too...

group_1.textLeft: In that case, why don't we start fresh and@look around tomorrow?
Yes, if it's okay with you.

group_1.textRight: I-I've never had someone to call a friend.
So I don't know what gift would be suitable...
I'd be glad if you could help me...um...
Please... Please refer to me as...

group_1.narration: I was so proud of myself that day.
It was the first time I'd arranged an@outing with someone I just met.
It's quite an adventure for me.
She reminded me so much of myself...
I felt like I was walking in Madoka's shoes.
